data.title: The 'T2: Judgment Day' IP comes to the 'The Terminator RPG'
data.meta_description: The ‘Terminator 2: Judgment Day’ franchise joins ‘The Terminator RPG’, the official roleplaying game based on ‘The Terminator’ movie. It should have ended with the destruction of the T-800. The future was saved, or was it? Did we just delay the inevitable? Did we fail? Perhaps there’s no fate but what we make. In ‘The […]
data.text: Our monthly newsletter is not a sales brochure! Inside we give you up-to-the-moment updates on all our product lines, the latest news, Kickstarter announcements and a cheeky snoop inside the minds of our team as they share with you an exclusive look into their current projects and inspirations.
